text: varini adugu: "Miru allah ku satiga kalpincukunna varilo srstini modatisari arambhincevadu, taruvata danini tirigi unikiloki teccevadu evadaina unnada?" Ila anu: "Srsti arambhincevadu, danini tirigi unikiloki teccevadu kevalam allah matrame! Ayite miru enduku mosagimpabadutunnaru (satyam nundi maralimpa badutunnaru)
